raw akas.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes
The Legend of the Legendary Heroes

akas: Densetsu no yuusha no densetsu (original title)
The Legend of the Legendary Heroes Japan (English title) (literal title)
The Legend of the Legendary Heroes World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Densetsu no yuusha no densetsu (original title)
The Legend of the Legendary Heroes Japan (English title) (literal title)
The Legend of the Legendary Heroes World-wide (English title)

1.title: Hirune oukoku no yabou

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Roland is changing under new king Sion. Ryner and Ferris enter Nelphan territory in search of relics of legendary heroes.

2.title: Eiyuu to neboke otoko

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sion remember his military college days where he first meet Ryner as talented but lazy student.

3.title: Arufa sutiguma

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Sion and college recruits are going in to the trap. Eris family found out that Sion is prince.

4.title: Ryner Report

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Sion is summoned to Eris villa. Lucille want to see what kind of king he would be. Ryner is moved to his prison.

5.title: A World That Has Begun to Awaken

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Ryner and Ferris are visiting Royal Nelphian library. In library they meet Toale, grandson of former emperor of Nelphia. Sion is hosting ball in Roland.

6.title: Those Lurking in the Darkness

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Sion is traveling to Nelpha although his advisers expect that trip to be dangerous. With him he only takes new member of his entourage Miran Froaude.

7.title: Don't let go of that Hand

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Lt. Milk continues her pursuit of Ryner right into the heart of a battle between Ryner, Ferris, and the Nelphan Army. In the midst of confusion a hero's relic is released and wreaks havoc across the countryside.

8.title: The Estabul Revolt

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Estabul, vassal kingdom, is rebelling against Roland. Sion is dispatching army commanded by Claugh with Miran as his advisor.

9.title: Rule Fragment

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Iris came again to Ryland and Ferris. She had letter from Sion, but she lost it. Ryland and Ferris assume Sion want them to go back to the last relic they lost.

10.title: Twilight

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Ryner is under control of his Alpha Stigma and destroy everything around. Ferris is trying to calm him down. Estabul's princess Noa is kept in Roland as hostage under Claugh's supervision.

11.title: Devil's Child

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Ryner and Ferris are looking for the boy Arua captured for having Alpha Stigma. Sion makes new decree in which he promotes all that support him.

12.title: The Great Housecleaning Banquet

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Ryner and Ferris are taking Arua to Regit. House Froaude is hosting banquet. There are also rumors about nobles uprising.

13.title: The Hero King of the North

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Kiefer remembers her past. Now she is Stohl soldier fighting against Gastark. In battle she meets Gastark emperor.

14.title: A World Where No One and Nothing Is Lost

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Arua finally wakes up. Ryner and Ferris start teaching him how to fight. They will try to save Arua's friend Kuku.

15.title: Kill the King

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Miran gives report to Sion. Ryner, Ferris, Milk and her squad all shipwrecked on what turns out to be Roland's shore.

16.title: The Goddess Who Doesn't Smile

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Ferris remembers events from four years ago when her brother Lucile killed their parents. Sion want Ryner and Ferris to go with him to Estabul.

17.title: Iino Doue (Annihilation Eye)

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Ryner has disappeared. Milk is missing. Sion orders Ferris to look for Ryner. He is going to Estabul to check information that Alpha Stigma appeared there.

18.title: Cursed Eyes

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Ryner is traveling alone. Sion is going to help Claugh. Members of Taboo breaker pursuit squadron are looking for missing members Stokard and Callaud.

19.title: The Directionless Ingrate

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Bearers of Eyes of God or gather together. Ryner is going there too. Gastark emperor finds out about Ryner.

20.title: A Mind not Filled with Despair

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Stokkart fights with Ryner but Ferris interferes. While they are fighting Ril attacks kids.

21.title: Roland's Darkness

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: On the Roland-Rune border new type of soldiers appear. Ryner and Ferris get back to Sion. Milk Callaud wakes up.

22.title: The Beast Called Alpha

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Lieral Lieutolu kidnaps Ryner. Lucile Eris tries to stop him but he stops so he can help Sion. Than Ferris tries to stop Lieral.

23.title: The Last Day

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Ryner and Ferris help Sion who is planing his birthday celebration. Claugh tries to recover and be ready for combat as soon as possible. Froaude wants his help in birthday organization.

24.title: A Distant Day's Promise

episode of.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: A dark spirit consumes Sion as he nearly takes Ryner's life. After Ryner and Ferris narrowly escape peril, Ryner vows to save his friend from the turmoil he endures on the twisted path to achieve his dream.

imdb.plot outline: Also known as The Legend of the Legendary heroes, follows three main characters: A dongo-obsessed female, a peace-crazy half noble, and a lazy nap-taking mage. The mage is the main protagonist, Ryner Lute, who is the bearer of the Alpha Stigma, a mark on the eyes which can take control of it's user forcing them to destroy or "erase" everything until they can gain control again. Ryner struggles with the fact he usually ends up killing anyone he gets close to, and also the fact as bearer of the Alpha Stigma, he is seen as a monster. A childhood friend of his, Sion, wishes for a world of Pearce without spilling an once of blood. To achieve this Sion overworked, worries and stresses much more than he needs to about everything. Ferris is the last of the three main heroes within the anime, and she is constantly eating dongo, beating up Ryner, and slaying enemies with her excellent sword skills. Working together The Swordswoman, Lazy mage and New king try to bring about peace and equalities for everyone in the kingdom of Roland, including bearers of the Alpha Stigma, and monsters alike
imdb.title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes
plot: Also known as The Legend of the Legendary heroes, follows three main characters: A dongo-obsessed female, a peace-crazy half noble, and a lazy nap-taking mage. The mage is the main protagonist, Ryner Lute, who is the bearer of the Alpha Stigma, a mark on the eyes which can take control of it's user forcing them to destroy or "erase" everything until they can gain control again. Ryner struggles with the fact he usually ends up killing anyone he gets close to, and also the fact as bearer of the Alpha Stigma, he is seen as a monster. A childhood friend of his, Sion, wishes for a world of Pearce without spilling an once of blood. To achieve this Sion overworked, worries and stresses much more than he needs to about everything. Ferris is the last of the three main heroes within the anime, and she is constantly eating dongo, beating up Ryner, and slaying enemies with her excellent sword skills. Working together The Swordswoman, Lazy mage and New king try to bring about peace and equalities for everyone in the kingdom of Roland, including bearers of the Alpha Stigma, and monsters alike
